mapper.insert: insert into t_rolepermission (ID, ROLEID, PERMID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_rolepermission set ROLEID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERMID = #{permid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ROLEID, PERMID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED from t_rolepermission
